name: Vision AI Agent
description: GPT-4V Realtime API integration for targeted object analysis in Android XR Glass applications

skills.name: Vision Language Model Processing
skills.description: Analyze crosshair-targeted objects using GPT-4V Realtime API for instant Q&A responses in XR.
examples: Analyze targeted objects from crosshair ROI using GPT-4V
Process user questions about specific objects via GPT Realtime API
Instant object identification and Q&A responses for AR Glass

skills.name: Multimodal AI Processing
skills.description: Combine visual, textual, and contextual data for comprehensive XR understanding.
examples: Context-aware object analysis with conversation memory
Multi-turn Q&A about targeted objects in real-time
Combine visual analysis with user voice queries

skills.name: Real-time Processing Optimization
skills.description: Low-latency vision processing optimized for XR performance requirements.
examples: Optimize GPT-4V responses for <1s latency in AR
Implement streaming responses via GPT Realtime API
Real-time object analysis with voice interaction support
